turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Trading Paint.
turn.1: What is the main aspect of the story Trading Paint?
turn.2: Although Cam survives his crash, he suffers multiple fractures on his leg and he is out of race for several months.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: In between these six months of recovery, Sam and Cam make peace with each other and Sam learns about Linsky wanting Cam to crash into him.
turn.5: What happens in the end of the six months?
turn.6: With both cars severely damaged, they need a new car to get back into racing.
turn.8: Throughout this time, Sam has kept the 1970 Mustang that killed his wife.
turn.10: Because of sentimental value, he could never sell it.
turn.11: What does he do with it finally?
turn.12: However, in order to buy a new dirt Late Model for Cam to drive, which costs about $80,000, Sam decides to sell his car to Linsky.
